column5: Great pictures! From the squeaky clean car and canoe to the awesome sunset, real nice stuff. Looks like a good time was had by all in a brilliant setting. Thanks for posting, ehg
Yep!!! Checked these earlier too.  Great shots KickinF.

It was great meeting you too Rob!!!  Beautiful pics!!!  ...I'll be bringing my tripod up next year, it seems that some of my pics came out as though the camera was "teetering"... I can't imagine why?  ... and the "fitting in" as others have mentioned is right on the button... you may want to seek counseling for that eh?
Nicely done Rob.    Gotta say tho, you don't look much like your avatar.   Thanks for the great report and it was great to meet you.
Excellent report and photos!!!!!!!!!  Love the shot of the doc at night with the green tint to it.  Also those purple sunsets just spectacular
Funny, most of my photos of you came out blurry too.
Neither do you.
Must have had sumpin' to do with that snazzy blueish rainsuit he was wearing...
You got some amazing shots there.  Pleasure meeting you this year.

First time for me at Lakair and with the exception of one, I had not met anybody else there in person. Board names, given names, avatar photos its a bit of a blur.  Loaded up and ready to go    Almost there     Went out for a paddle as soon as I got there   Think this guy knows the other place around the bend has a bigger one on his boat house???   I even had time to fish   Lots of people, many like me, with a board name and a given name   Night time at the dock   Bedtime after the campfire. (the campfire photos will be up for auction soon)   5 am and it's time to fish (after a couple of photos)     Lakair from the water    A nice little spot with deep water and a little current... and some fish    From the cast of characters. GCD kept his shirt on the whole weekend.(Roy too)    Gearing-up for the pike tourney     Group shot (and a testament to the dock's strength)   The big fish of the day... the pike not the angler     TJ fish jugglin'      One of our southern friends and his jet boat   Irishfeild thought I needed a shower???   Beans' shirt. There was not much of the former but a lot of the latter.   The prize table with the King and Queen presiding over their court.   First Canadian fishing trip for the Spawn of the Spawn of ED   Betcha he comes back   Ed, Spawn of, and Spawn of Spawn of   The winner   Series of sun set shots (that little dot of light is Bly and Cliff)   Bly and Cliff comin' in       Sitin' around the fire     Great time. Great people. Thanks to all.
GREAT Pics!!!!!  Somehow I espected that though  Great to meet you  Maureen
Great pictures!!  Some great ones of Dawson!!!
Great pics, nice to see a canoe amongst all the horsepower out there.
WOW, Some super pics there, great too meet you
Nice pics, they sure did turn out great. But, I did not realize there was a 5am at Lakair?
Nice meeting you, Rob. Thanks for those great pics. I guess you forgot the canoe crack ones eh?
You know it's 5AM when Lew is making lunch - you can set your clock by it.  Great pics kickingfrog - I have to remember to put down the beer and pick up the camara more often! -Brian
looked like a great time. too bad i missed out. maybe see you all at BOQ
awesome pictures!  love those sunsets pics wow!  cheers!
Awesome report.....absolutely fantastic pictures...thanks for sharing...the sunset pics are incredible!
Nice pics and nice to meet you.For those that missed the GTG Kicking Frog fit right in and was pretty much the official photgrapher of the GTG.
Beautiful pictures KF..... Nice to see ya there
Outstanding pictures!
Thanks Joe, the "fit right in" kinda hurts though.
COOL... im thinking of showing up next year
Looks like a great ti9me was had by all. I hope GCD didn't catch a cold though. He must have been freezing up here, wearing his shirt!
Becky told us he wouldn't go topless cuz he hadn't waxed.  JF

Wow!! Amazing pics!  I loved those pics of bly and I coming in for the night....  oh yeah...the sunset in it looked ok too....  It was great meeting you...took a lot of guts to show up...not knowing anyone, but you fit right in....see you there next year!
Looks like a super fun trip guys'n'gals!!!....I'm hopin' to make it out for next year!!  ....someone mentioned BOQ????? is this another GTG???
Thanks for taking alot of pictures you have an amazing eye for the right shots. I was very pleased to meet you and wish we had a chance to fish owell their is next year.  Art
Those are fantastic!
great photos, feels like I was there
Great report, glad you enjoyed your first time there.
Well looks like someones going to have to do some schedule amending for next year, those pics just make it look soooo inviting.
